headline: LyondellBasell Industries NV (LYB) Price Target Raised at RBC Capital
summary: LyondellBasell Industries (NYSE:LYB) is one of the best chemical stocks to buy, according to billionaires. On July 3, RBC Capital analyst Arun Viswanathan increased the stock’s price target to $64 from $61. The price hikes come as the research firm maintains a ’Sector Perform’ rating on the stock. The bullish rating comes as the company […]

headline: Should You Buy the 3 Highest-Paying Dividend Stocks in the S&P 500?
summary: Dow offers a forward dividend yield of nearly 10%, the highest by far in the S&P 500.  LyondellBasell Industries is another S&P 500 chemical stock with an ultrahigh yield.  ConAgra Brands has both an attractive dividend and valuation.

headline: LyondellBasell, Polynt Partner to Develop Low-Carbon Marine Resins
summary: LyondellBasell Industries (NYSE:LYB) is one of the best basic materials stocks to invest in. In the earlier days of July, LyondellBasell Industries announced an expanded partnership with Polynt, which is a global leader in specialty polymers and intermediates. The two companies are jointly developing a high-quality resin specifically for the marine sector. The new resin […]

headline: LyondellBasell Industries N : JV GXLYB Receives FDA No Objection Letter for Recycled PP and HDPE
summary: SHANGHAI, July 17, 2025 - Genox LyondellBasell New Material Co., Ltd., , a plastics recycling joint venture between LyondellBasell and Genox Recycling, has received No Objection Letters from the...
